mapper.insert: insert into freshman_board values (FRESHMAN_BOARD_SEQ.nextval, default, #{fbTitle}, #{fbWriter}, #{fbContent}, default, sysdate, sysdate, default, #{fLocation}, default, #{fRentType}, #{fLivingType}, #{fRoomCount}, #{fFloor}, #{fPrice}, #{fParking}, #{fReqGender}, #{contactInfo})
mapper.select: select fm.*, a.originalfilename, a.renamefilename from freshman_board fm left join attachment a on a.bcode=fm.bcode where fm.fbid = a.refbid and fbstatus='Y' and fbid=#{fbId}
mapper.update: update freshman_board set fbContent=#{fbContent}, fbmodifydate = SYSDATE, flocation = #{fLocation}, frenttype=#{fRentType}, flivingtype=#{fLivingType}, froomcount=#{fRoomCount}, ffloor=#{fFloor}, fprice=#{fPrice}, fparking=#{fParking}, freqgender=#{fReqGender}, contactInfo=#{contactInfo} where fbId = #{fbId}
mapper.insert: insert into Reply values (reply_seq.nextval, #{bCode}, #{rContent}, #{refbId}, #{rWriter}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, default)
mapper.select: select * from Reply r join freshman_board f on f.bcode=r.bcode and r.refbid = f.fbid where refbid=${fbId} and rstatus='Y'
